QuestData.Title: A Wrinkle in Time
QuestData.Description: Listen carefully, $c, for though we are only beginning, time already grows short and the consequences of our failure are unfathomable.$b$bAn event in the recent past has been obscured from my vision by the most powerful of magics. Its impact, however, has not.$b$bIf action is not taken to change the course of this timeline's future, the outcome is clear.$b$bBrace yourself, mortal, and behold the future of Azeroth.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Anachronos in the Caverns of Time to witness the future of Azeroth.
QuestData.RewardText: Now, $r, you know the reasoning behind your summons.
